entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain overnight. Freezing rain over northern sections after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
